DataElement.preferredName: Donor Provide Prior Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the donor was used for prior hematopoietic cell transplantations.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Donor Provide Prior Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._Supply what is desired or needed._Earlier in time or order._Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Concepts.definition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Property.preferredName: Provide Prior Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation
Property.preferredDefinition: Supply what is desired or needed.:Earlier in time or order.:Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.):The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual.

Concepts.definition: Supply what is desired or needed.

Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)
Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, unknown, not done or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Done Not Applicable Indicator
